trans-unit.source:
\n

Describes the console key that was pressed, including the character represented by the console key and the state of the SHIFT, ALT, and CTRL modifier keys.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx XXXXX$ XXX$ xxx XXXX xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The Unicode character that corresponds to the key parameter.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx Xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx $xx$xxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The console key that corresponds to the keyChar parameter.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx $xx$xxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue to indicate that a SHIFT key was pressed; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xxxx x XXXXX xxx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue to indicate that an ALT key was pressed; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx XXX xxx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue to indicate that a CTRL key was pressed; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxxx xxxx x XXXX xxx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The numeric value of the key parameter is less than 0 or greater than 255.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx $xx$xxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx 0 xx xxxxxxx xxxx 000.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A value that identifies the console key that was pressed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: true if a is not equal to b; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx $xx$x$$xx$ xx xxx xxxxx xx $xx$x$$xx$$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
